text: The 1992 Big Eight Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 13–15 at Kemper Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Top-seeded Kansas defeated #2 seed Oklahoma State in the championship game, 66–57, to earn the conference's automatic bid to the 1992 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Tournament Category:Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1992 Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
